name: We Have Everything
description:
This game was made for the Glitches Are Queer Game Jam.

In We Have Everything you build a factory. The thing about it is that things are not really specific. Various machines that manufacture different products.

You can buy different Machines and even upgrade them to make them more effective.

Every Sprite except the Player Sprite was made by me.

Player Sprite Credits:

https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

Notes:

This game was not really finished. I probably had enough time left  but i suddenly just wasn't in the mood to proceed.

This means planned features are not in the game like:

- Mailman, for some tasks you would need to wait for the Mailman and you would be able to talk to him. By talking with him you would make him like you or not. 

Which would make him come faster to help you with some of the planned tasks.

- Seeing Employes walk around. It was planned seeing employes walk around.

- Much more Machines.
